title: Fastest Tower this Season
body:
It took my team 5:25 seconds. On of my friends managed 5:12 seconds... 

That means it took 8 minion waves... well really 7  if you considered travel time... but what about you guys?

My fastest baron was 20:12.

replies.body: https://image.prntscr.com/image/qL6F4X_mQA2kdL5EGGCdSQ.png

Forgot to mention:

We had master yi jungle that went lvl 2 bot after red got double and completely annihilated their turret.

mine is at 2:33
https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/es/featured/year-in-review-2017#/summoner/euw/danielpezglobo

> [{quoted}](name=Danielpezglobo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KLWat7pK,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2017-12-20T01:12:51.021+0000)
>
> mine is at 2:33
> https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/es/featured/year-in-review-2017#/summoner/euw/danielpezglobo

Geezus HOW? I mean even in this meta thats redic. Support running demolish and started Ruby crystal?

actually was before pre-season arrives, i remenber the game as i mid laner i roam lv 2 bot with my jungle , kill botlane and take the tower, was a really funny stomp.
Edit: i was playinga mage, and i didnt have anything special to do more damage to towers.
How is that even possible?
ok thats just ridiculous lol
Next time someone says "towers aren't that weak" I just gonna show this image.

> [{quoted}](name=JungleTaliyahWTF,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KLWat7pK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-19T14:57:43.028+0000)
>
> https://image.prntscr.com/image/qL6F4X_mQA2kdL5EGGCdSQ.png

lmfao howd u do it

[https://imgur.com/fj9gzqq](https://imgur.com/fj9gzqq)
2:57 didn't think this was posible

Fastest tower 3:57
Baron 20:17
Dont ask me how we took a tower a minute and a half after minions started fighting. I dont rememver XD
Well, you got the tower because you got a kill on the adc and forced the support to back. That seems clear to me, and like a proportionate reward for getting First Blood.

I GOT 3:34 LOL

I played viktor support with my duo premade bot and we just steamrolled the enemy bot lvl1 and spam hit their turret, killing them again when they came back.

FUN GAME
Mine is like 3:17 or something , don't even know how that happened lol
Mine was 4:13. Thats sad a'f

It'd be cool if they applied that 'fortify' """buff""" they gave mid and top towers to bot.

Simply because it's really fun having 5 people come bot 6-7 minutes in and demolishing your tower instantly.

Fastest tower: 6:51
Fastest Baron: 20:27

Tower- 4:13

Baron-20:15

Fastest Tower - 5:18
Fastest Baron - 20:32
